# Select input
  
```{r select-input}
selectInput(
  inputId = 'dropDown1',
  label = "Please make a selection",
  choices = list('Value 1' = 1,
                 'Value 2' = 2,
                 'Value 3' = 3)
)
```

Print the value:
  
```{r print-select-input, echo=FALSE}
renderPrint(input$dropDown1)
```
